filterDimensions.query: WITH MEMBER Measures.Nul as Null SELECT {[Measures].[Nul]}*{[Store].[Store State].Members} ON COLUMNS FROM [Warehouse]
filterDimensions.label: State

viz-1-1.query: SELECT NON EMPTY {[Measures].[Units Ordered]} * Union({[Store].[Store State].Hierarchy.FirstChild.Parent}, Except({[Store].[Store State].Members}, {})) ON COLUMNS FROM [Warehouse]

viz-1-2.panelTitle: Bar: Units Ordered by state excluding Oregon
viz-1-2.headerText: Units Ordered by state (bar chart), excluding Oregon
viz-1-2.query: SELECT NON EMPTY {[Measures].[Units Ordered]} * Union({[Store].[Store State].Hierarchy.FirstChild.Parent}, Except({[Store].[Store State].Members}, {[Store].[Store State].[OR]})) ON COLUMNS FROM [Warehouse]

viz-1-3.query: SELECT NON EMPTY {[Measures].[Units Ordered]} * Union({[Store].[Store State].Hierarchy.FirstChild.Parent}, Except({[Store].[Store State].Members}, {})) ON COLUMNS FROM [Warehouse]

viz-1-4.panelTitle: Pie: Units Ordered by state for filtering
viz-1-4.headerText: Units Ordered by state (pie chart), to test filtering
viz-1-4.query: SELECT NON EMPTY {[Measures].[Units Ordered]} * {#[Store].[Store State]#} ON COLUMNS FROM [Warehouse]

viz-1-5.panelTitle: Bar: Units Ordered by state for filtering
viz-1-5.headerText: Units Ordered by state (bar chart), for testing filtering
viz-1-5.query: SELECT NON EMPTY {[Measures].[Units Ordered]} * {#[Store].[Store State]#} ON COLUMNS FROM [Warehouse]
